title: Penguin island: Australia's little penguins
creator_credit: Patrick Gillespie, Gordon Badham and BandG Communications
brief_description: Hosted by Peter Hoskings, this is a tourist orientated film that never the less provides a wealth of facts and figures about the fairy penguins, and background information about Phillip Island. Excellent cinematography reveals much about the scenary and wild life of the island including koalas, kangaroos and wallabies, wombats, seals, wild flowers and birds.
